Uses of Package
quarks.providers.direct

  • Packages that use quarks.providers.direct 
    Package Description
    quarks.providers.development
    Execution of a streaming topology in a development environment .
    quarks.providers.direct
    Direct execution of a streaming topology.
    quarks.samples.apps
    Support for some more complex Quarks application samples.
  • Classes in quarks.providers.direct used by quarks.providers.development 
    Class and Description
    DirectProvider
    DirectProvider is a TopologyProvider that runs a submitted topology as a Job in threads in the current virtual machine.
  • Classes in quarks.providers.direct used by quarks.providers.direct 
    Class and Description
    DirectTopology 
  • Classes in quarks.providers.direct used by quarks.samples.apps 
    Class and Description
    DirectProvider
    DirectProvider is a TopologyProvider that runs a submitted topology as a Job in threads in the current virtual machine.
